exclusion: The Dimmer enters the mode of exclusion after quick pressing three times the push-button connected to S1 terminal or push-button B located inside the housing.
inclusion: The Dimmer enters the mode of inclusion after quick pressing three times the push-button connected to S1 terminal or push-button B located inside the housing.
label: FGD211
overview: Remotely controlled Dimmer is designed to operate with or without neutral lead. It may be used as a switch in systems without neutral lead.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Updating the dimming level without switch

options.label: ALL ON disabled / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON disabled / ALL OFF active
ALL ON active / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active / ALL OFF active

parameters.label: Separation of association sending (key 1)
parameters.description: Activate/Deactivate association sending for group				1 - Also see param #16
parameters.overview:
Sending commands to control devices assigned to 1-st association group (key no. 1).

NOTE: Parameter 15 value must be set to 1 to work properly. This activates the double-click functionality - dimmer/roller shutter control.

options.label: Map status to all devices in group 1
Map OFF status to devices in group 1 - last state
Map OFF status to devices in group 1 - 100% state

parameters.label: Control key #2 behaviour
parameters.description: Checking the device status before sending a control frame from the key no. 2.
parameters.overview:
Info: Key no. 2 is not represented by any physical device expect of devices on association list. This functionality prevents of lack of reaction on pressing key no. 2 through polling devices from list one by one and checking thier actual states.

It is not possible to check the device status before sending a control frame from the key no. 2 if roller blind switch is chosen in parameter 14 (value 2)

If devices state is checked before sending asociation then parameter 19 should be set to value 0.

parameters.label: Time of MANUALLY moving between dimming values
Time of AUTOMATIC moving between dimming values
parameters.description: Time of Automatic moving the Dimmer between the extreme dimming values
parameters.overview:
Options for changing parameter 0-255 (0ms – 2.5s)

0 - this value disables the smooth change in light intensity

NOTE value 0 is required for inductive and capacitive devices unsuitable for dimming, (e.g. fluorescent lamps , motors etc.)

options.label: State NOT saved at power failure

parameters.label: 3-way switch
parameters.overview:
The function of 3 - way switch, provides the option to double key no. 1.
The Dimmer may control two toggle push-buttons or an infinite number of momentary push-buttons.

parameters.label: Synchronizing light level for associated devices
parameters.description: The dimmer communicate the level to the associated devices. (default value 0)

parameters.label: Change [On-Off] bi-stable keys
parameters.description: Assigns bistable key status to the device status.
parameters.overview: Info: Remote control from Fibaro System Is Still Possible. This function is useful When you want display status of external devices, e.g. Motion Sensor, in Fibaro System.

options.label: Device changes status on key status change
Device status depends on key status.

parameters.label: Minimum level of the Dimmer
parameters.description: Enable decreasing the minimum level of the Dimmer
parameters.overview:
This function will enable decreasing the minimum level of the Dimmer by extending the control impulse. [100 - 170]      

By changing the minimem level, the user may completely dim LED bulbs.

Not all LED bulbs available on the market have the dimmm

parameters.label: Relay 1: Response to General Alarm
parameters.description: Resonse to alarm of any type
parameters.overview: Alarm of any type (general alarm, water flooding alarm, smoke alarm: CO, CO2, temperature alarm).

parameters.label: ALARM FLASHING alarm time
parameters.description: Amount of time (ms) the device keeps on flashing after receipt of Alarm Frame

parameters.label: Updating the dimming level without switch.
parameters.overview: Parameter’s value changes depending on the dimming level.

parameters.label: Scene activation functionality
parameters.description: Sending commands with command class scene activation
parameters.overview: The device offers the possibility of sending commands compatible with Command class scene activation. Information is sent to devices assigned to association group no. 3. Controllers such as Home Center 2 are able to interpret such commands and based on these commands they activate scenes, to which specific scene IDs have been assigned. The user may expand the functionality of the button connected to inputs S1 and S2 by distinguishing the actions of keys connected to those inputs. For example: double click would activate the scene "goodnight" and triple click would activate the scene "morning"
